dishes.name: Angular Application
dishes.label: Single Page App
dishes.description: This web application was designed as a moch restaurant. I chose to building the foundation with the Angular framework for performance and design purposes. There are several features which include:  interactive menu, a rating system, a detailed contact page, jqury server, and much more!

comments.comment: Imagine all the eatables, living in conFusion!
comments.author: John Lemon

comments.comment: Sends anyone to heaven, I wish I could get my mother-in-law to eat it!
comments.author: Paul McVites

comments.comment: Eat it, just eat it!
comments.author: Michael Jaikishan

comments.comment: Ultimate, Reaching for the stars!
comments.author: Ringo Starry

comments.comment: It's your birthday, we're gonna party!
comments.author: 25 Cent

dishes.name: Raspberry Pi 'ULV'
dishes.description: A fun project that allows the user to control their very own tank! Features include but not limited too: variable motor contorl, live IR video feed, capturing images with automated email to user, PlayStation 3 contoller input...

dishes.name: Speed Up America Contributions
dishes.label: New
dishes.description: SpeedUpAmerica aims to provide on the ground truth about the Internet in America. I contribute to this program in hopes to help give the community some truth behind their internet speeds.

promotions.label: New
promotions.description: A fun project that allows the user to control their very own tank! Features include but not limited too: variable motor contorl, live IR video feed, capturing images with automated email to user, PlayStation 3 contoller input...

leadership.name: James Coulter
leadership.description: A loving husband and father who finds technology, mechanical & electrical engineering, and the outdoors to be interesting. I am always pushing myself to keep current with the tech industry, specifically in the app development side of things.
